p: The whole COVID-19 situation has been overwhelming to our practice due to the delay it has caused. With a delay of 1 month, about 130 patients who could have been operated on were delayed. We are now operating, performing 8 prostatectomies a day, 5 days a week, which could ultimately lead to burnout of our team members. There is also a possibility that we would be operating on large volume disease which could lead to longer OR time and more positive surgical margins [ 9].
